JOB DESCRIPTION: Netwalk GmbH is looking for Automotive Embedded Software Developers to work in innovative automotive projects in Germany.Duties: Embedded Software Development in C  Design and development of software based on Autosar architecture Integration & verification of the developed SW components Debugging and error analysis Create design documents Participate in Design & Code reviews   Qualifications: University degree in electrical/electronics engineering, computer science or similar  Minimum 5 years of experience in embedded software development Solid C programming skills Ideally with Autosar experience Knowledge on Functional Safety (ISO 26262) Familiar with Vector tools like DaVinci Configurator, Geny, CANoe, etc.. Knowledge of scripting tools like Python, CAPL, etc...Interested candidates please send updated CV to jobs@netwalk.de

EDUCATION.UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication, Automobile, Instrumentation, Computers
EDUCATION.PG: Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech in Computers, Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication, Automobile, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
